title: Wierd error relating to firewall
body: SO Ive just downloaded the latest patch and I got into champ select no problem, but when champ select finished my loading screen bugged and I got the attached error message. I checked my firewall's settings and nothing seems to be in the way of it! Any help to be had here? Is there another program that I have to enable in firewall or what?  Q_Q

replies.body: Sometimes, an update will change League's program name (like, from League v4.21 to League v5.1), hence the entry in your firewall whitelist doesn't match League's current name. Try adding it again.
